TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlNamedNodeMap extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of nodes that can be accessed by name or index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `XmlNamedNodeMap` is returned by the following three properties.
- <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.Attributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - Returns <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection>, a class which inherits from `XmlNamedNodeMap`.
- <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Entities%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - Returns an `XmlNamedNodeMap` containing <xref:System.Xml.XmlEntity> objects. The `XmlNamedNodeMap` is read-only.
- <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Notations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - Returns an `XmlNamedNodeMap` containing <xref:System.Xml.XmlNotation> objects. The `XmlNamedNodeMap` is read-only.

Docs.summary: Gets the number of nodes in the .

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection> class (which inherits from `XmlNamedNodeMap`) to display all the attributes of a book.
[!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlNamedNodeMap.Count Example#1](../../add/codesnippet/CPP/p-system.xml.xmlnamednod_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNamedNodeMap.Count Example#1](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/p-system.xml.xmlnamednod_1.vb)] [!code-cs[Classic WebData XmlNamedNodeMap.Count Example#1](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/p-system.xml.xmlnamednod_1.cs)]

Docs.param: The qualified name of the node to retrieve. It is matched against the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name%2A> property of the matching node.
Docs.returns: An with the specified name or if a matching node is not found.

The namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the node to retrieve.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.XmlNode Item(int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The index position of the node to retrieve from the . The index is zero-based; therefore, the index of the first node is 0 and the index of the last node is <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamedNodeMap.Count%2A> -1.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the node at the specified index in the .
Docs.returns: The at the specified index. If is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamedNodeMap.Count%2A> property, is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.XmlNode SetNamedItem(class System.Xml.XmlNode node) cil managed

Docs.param: An to store in the . If a node with that name is already present in the map, it is replaced by the new one.
Docs.returns: If the replaces an existing node with the same name, the old node is returned; otherwise, is returned.
